nl.tudelft.dnainator.graph

Interface Graph

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AnnotationCollection
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Neo4jGraph

    public interface Graph
extends AnnotationCollection
    Interface for backend agnostic interaction with a graph.

    • Method Summary
